item.title: DmC
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
Dotard:

You are right … but in dmc4 you obtained moves sooner than in dmc3
[COLOR=‘Red’]Dumbing down game mechanics is nowadays considered better? Okay

and in 3 you had to level up every style while in 4 you can buy upgrade …
[COLOR=‘red’]see above
Also dmc4 Dante is faster than in dmc3
[COLOR=‘Red’]hahaha no

And:
-Wild stomp = Dante matured so useless
-Free ride = Dante matured again
[COLOR=‘red’]Yeah, so he’s ‘matured’ - that means we make him absolutely the same, only with less moves. Okay
-Point blank = you can power up shotgun in dmc4 whenever you want
[COLOR=‘red’]I’m not sure whether you recall correctly what point blank did
-Wall hike = in dmc4 there are no environments suited for that
[COLOR=‘red’]proving the point that Dante was a fucking afterthought
-Crazy dance = Dante matured for a third time
-Pole play = there are no poles in dmc4 also Dante matured once again
[COLOR=‘red’]see above
-Tornado = 1st missing
-Million stab = it is in dmc4 after combo with Rebellion
[COLOR=‘red’]the whole “repeatedly press button at certain time” mechanic is missing
-Hyper fist = 2nd missing
-Yamato = Because its not Dante’s sword … only Vergil is master with that
[COLOR=‘red’]seriously? You sure is humourist

dmc3 guns:
-artemis = useless
[COLOR=‘red’]Bold statement. And wrong. And failing to address the point completely. If it’s so useless, why didn’t we get anything useful instead?
-Kalina Ann = Lady have it back in dmc4
[COLOR=‘red’]Are you playing dumb?
-Spiral = 1st missing gun

devil arms:
-Agni&Rudra = 1st missing weapon
-Nevan = Useless and Dante cant bring his guitar with him everywhere
[COLOR=‘red’]Nevan, uselless. Okay. And it is funny that you go all the way to ‘prove me wrong’ while completely missing the point

abilities:
-DT explosion, Nero have it … also Dante’s DT changed again and with his speed in dmc 4 that would be overpowered
-Kick jump, again Nero can run n’ kick
[COLOR=‘red’]okay

styles:
-quicksilver is overpowered and there is Key of cronus in dmc4
-doppelganger = 1st style missing
[COLOR=‘red’]okay

So ?

[COLOR=‘red’]You’re funny. I wonder why you had to go all that way. Yeah, okay, nice job trying to dismiss everything.
Yet the point is not that. The point is that DMC4 Dante has:

  • less weapons
  • Less moves
  • no monster designed for him
  • no environments designed for him

And is slower with the introduction of all those ridiculous lags.
Therefore is a lazy afterthought smelling of an attempt to make Nero not to loook like a fucking joke (which he is).

+the obvious attempt of fixing what was not broken to make it easier for noobs

Read full topic

item.title: DmC
item.dc:creator: Navitas
item.description:
I’m going to have to side with ODB on this one…
While some of the removed weapons/moves might not be 100% efficient, some of those made the game more fun. I’m no super awesome power player pro when it comes to DMC, so efficiency only mattered somewhat to me. Oh and I liked Nevan and Free Ride

The main thing I liked with 3 was the whole Dante/Vergil rivalry. Playing as Vergil was pretty cool too. I was quite disappointed when Vergil got left out of 4.

Nero was at least better than the recent typical japanese male leads (I’m looking at you Final Fantasy). I would have preferred Vergil though.

4’s ending seemed a bit weak to me too.

Read full topic

item.description:
You are right … but in dmc4 you obtained moves sooner than in dmc3 and in 3 you had to level up every style while in 4 you can buy upgrade …

styles:

So yeah Dante in dmc4 have:
-2 missing attacks
-1 missing gun
-1 missing devil arm
-DT explosion nerf but he have trigger heart
-kick, lol not too important
-doppelganger is missing

But he have those additional abilities you mentioned so I think he is better in Dmc4 and also his Gilgamesh have 2 missing attacks from Beowulf but have all Vergil’s moves.

So ?

Read full topic

item.title: DmC
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
Wild Stomp, Free Ride, Point Blank, Wall Hike, Crazy Dance, Pole Play, Tornado, Million Stab, Hyper Fist to name a few… several yamato moves are missing too btw

That’s only one of the grudges.
Combine it with the fact that monsters were designed to cater to Nero’s DB, and here we go…

Do I really need to go all the way to tell how underwhelming DMC4 Dante was compared to DMC3?

But just for consistency’s sake:

DMC3:
5 Guns

5 Devil Arms

  • Rebellion has 9 moves
  • Cerberus has 6 moves
  • A&R has 9 moves
  • Nevan has 11 moves
  • Beowulf has 8 moves

6 Styles

  • Trickster has 6 moves
  • Swordmaster adds 7 moves to Rebellion, 5 to Cerberus, 6 to A&R, 5 to Nevan and 6 to Beowulf
  • Gunslinger adds 5 moves to E&I, 6 to the Shotgun, 3 to Artemis, 3 to Spiral and 2 to Kalina Ann
  • Royalguard has 9 moves (10 if you count roll-JG)
  • Quicksilver only has Time-Lag
  • Doppelganger only has After-Image

Plus the innate abilities Devil Trigger Explosion, Free Ride, Pole Play and Kick Jump.

DMC4:
3 Guns; E&I and Shotgun have Charge Shot without the need for Gunslinger and Pandora has 4 moves on its own

3 Devil Arms

  • Rebellion has 8 moves
  • Gilgamesh has 6 moves
  • Lucifer has 9 moves

5 Styles

  • Trickster has 5 moves
  • Swordmaster adds 5 moves to Rebellion, 6 to Gilgamesh and 3 to Lucifer
  • Gunslinger adds 3 moves to E&I, 4 to the Shotgun and 3 to Pandora
  • Royalguard has 9 moves
  • Darkslayer has 4 moves

Plus the innate abilities Speed and Kick Jump/Enemy Step.

In total, DMC3 Dante has 117 moves, while DMC4 Dante has 74, not counting the Taunt.

Yep, we basically get all the same Dante, only worse. Wasting time on Nero was a baaaaad idea.

Read full topic

item.title: DmC
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
Recycled, nerfed, and slowed down Dante =/= good (combine that with lack of devil arms = fail), Nero’s arm was the cheapest thing in hack’n’slash history and as per character development, his + kyrie lovestory was cringeworthy.
Add the whole go-through-the-game-backwards and fight-the-same-bosses-3-fucking-times - and all in all, you get a lazy milking attempt while the cow was still alive.

I missed the old gunslinger/trickster moves + million stab system. It seriously makes you feel that they simply wanted to make Nero look good.

Read full topic

item.title: DmC
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
DMC 4 was a gay final fantasy ripoff + Dante was stripped of hell of a lot of moves.
Nero is a faggot failure too.

As far as those stupid rankings go, mine is:
DMC/DMC2 - epic gothic tale + epic designs/backgrounds pushing ps2 to it’s limit.
DMC3 - combat + Vergil/Dante
.
.
.
.
.
.
DMC4 - cringe, tho it was fun to play for a while

But good enemies,music,story too and fights with Mundus are epic

But overall is Dmc3 better and Dmc4 graphics,style and combat smoothness are unmatched.

So for me its dmc3,dmc4,dmc2,dmc1
